about.title: About me
about.p1: I am a Full-Stack Software Developer and an incoming Electrical and Electronics Engineer, operating out of Turkiye. I'm passionate about creating practical, elegantly engineered solutions that bridge software and hardware.
about.p2: My expertise is centered on the modern stack (Next.js, React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS) with robust backend skills in Node.js/Laravel. I specialize in rapid, high-impact development.
about.p3: Achievements include independently building a full-scale Auto Repair Management software in one month, and currently developing Minimind, a consolidated productivity app to combat software bloat. I constantly seek new challenges and value continuous learning to deliver the best possible results.
